title: Cancel a Sales Order
description: A customer needs to cancel an order that has been placed but has not yet entered production.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct sales order.

tasks.description: Verify that the linked work order has not yet started.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the work order status and confirms it is still 'Scheduled', not 'In Progress'.

tasks.description: Cancel the sales order and the associated work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels both records in the system and informs the customer.
